1.title: Razzy Blue Smoothie
1.instructions:
Peel the banana and cut into 1/2-inch chunks. Chill in freezer until solid, about 2 hours.
Place the almonds, oats, and flaxseed meal into a blender; pulse until finely ground. Add the frozen banana, frozen blueberries, yogurt, grape juice, and buttermilk; puree until smooth.

ingredients: 1/2 cup fresh spinach, or more to taste
1 pinch salt-free seasoning blend (such as Mrs. Dash® Southwest Chipotle), or to taste
1 dash hot sauce (such as Frank's RedHot ®), or to taste
1 dash Worcestershire sauce, or to taste
2.title: Terri's Spicy Vegetable Smoothie
2.instructions: Combine spinach, carrot, celery, tomato, apple, lime juice, ground flaxseed, ginger, seasoning blend, hot sauce, and Worcestershire sauce in a blender; add enough water to cover. Blend mixture until smooth.

3.title: Fruit and Yogurt Smoothie
3.instructions: Blend the banana, yogurt, sugar, pineapple juice, strawberries, orange juice, and milk in a blender until smooth.

4.title: Mango-Banana Smoothie
4.instructions: Combine the banana, mango, yogurt, and juice in a blender; blend until nearly smooth.

5.title: Kale Banana Smoothie
5.instructions: Put coconut water, banana, avocado, kale, lemon juice, and cayenne pepper in blender; blend until smooth, about 30 seconds.
